definitions: the quality of being unpleasantly rough or jarring to the senses

examples.text: he slowly opened his eyes to the harshness of the light
the harshness of her tone of voice
glycerin can be added to reduce the harshness of the soap on the skin

shortDefinitions: quality of being unpleasantly rough or jarring to senses

definitions: the quality of being cruel or severe

examples.text: he has a reputation for the harshness of his judgments
lies enable us to smooth over the cold, brutal harshness of reality

shortDefinitions: quality of being cruel or severe

definitions: the condition of being difficult to live in

examples.text: spring is a welcome relief from the harshness of winter
the harshness of the Scottish climate

shortDefinitions: condition of being difficult to live in
